summary: After a boiler explosion aboard an aging ocean liner, a man struggles to free his injured wife from the wreckage of their cabin and ensure the safety of their four-year-old daughter as the ship begins to sink.
cast: Robert Stack|Dorothy Malone|George Sanders|Edmond O'Brien|Woody Strode|Jack Kruschen|Joel Marston|George Furness|Richard Norris|Marshall Kent|Andrew Hughes|Robert Martin|Bill Wilson|Tammy Marihugh
